title: What are some Historical pictures that you have viewed publicly from the 1920's - 1970's? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Hindenburg disaster in 1937 had photo as well as radio coverage.  Prior to 1970 it may have been one of the most viewed images.  It may have been the first disaster caught live with news footage and radio broadcast sound Hindenburg Disaster With Sound (Herb Morrison, WLS Radio) (Standard 4:3) : Pathgrams (Video), WLS Radio (Sound) : Free Download & Streaming : Internet Archive  Anyone growing up in after that timeframe and into 1970 would have these images in their memory.

Look at Time Life books, there's a lot of historical images. National Geographic is another magazine with great images. National Geographic magazine  On the News / editorial side check out POY Pictures of the Year - It's a Photojournalism publication, many different photographers form many different news organizations Home Ι Pictures of the Year
